text:
Hey all, is there any way to pull the `internal value` of a dropdown select? I have a custom object property where the labels are full names, while the internal values are unique slugs. The unique slugs are the values I need - not the labels that are returned by default.

For example in the screenshot attached the 1st column (labels) is what's being returned by default. I am hoping to access the column circled in blue which contains the internal values.

I've tried accessing these through dot notation as one would expect but with no success.
